segments.text: How about you , Chuck ? Where did you grow up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was born in Ohio , but I grew up in Texas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when did you come to Los Angeles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In 1978 . I went to college here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Drama . I was an actor for five years after college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's interesting . So why did you become a hairdresser ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I needed the money . And because I was good at it . Look ! What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2
